update wound_orders set order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ord_type = #{ordType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, business = #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medical_number = #{medicalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appointment_type = #{appointmentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, surgery_name = #{surgeryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perioperative_surgery = #{perioperativeSurgery,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, surgery_time = #{surgeryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, wound_photo_ids = #{woundPhotoIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wound_photography_time = #{woundPhotographyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, taking_lens = #{takingLens,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wound_condition = #{woundCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_confirm = #{isConfirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_reservation = #{isReservation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, association_id = #{associationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from( SELECT wo.id, wo.appointment_type, wo.association_id, wo.business, wo.create_time, wo.doctor_id, wo.is_confirm, wo.is_delete, wo.is_reservation, wo.medical_number, wo.ord_type, wo.order_number, wo.order_price, wo.order_type, wo.perioperative_surgery, wo.surgery_name, wo.surgery_time, wo.taking_lens, wo.task_id, wo.update_time, wo.wound_condition, wo.wound_photo_ids, wo.wound_photography_time, tp.`name`, tp.barcode_photo, tp.phone, doctor.doctor_name, doctor.doctor_introduce, doctor.doctor_photo, doctor.doctor_services, doctor.doctor_type, group_concat( trust_file.file_url ORDER BY trust_file.file_name DESC SEPARATOR '|' ) AS url, group_concat( trust_file.file_id ORDER BY trust_file.file_id DESC SEPARATOR '|' ) AS fileId, ( SELECT group_concat( trust_file.file_url ORDER BY trust_file.file_name DESC SEPARATOR '|' ) AS url FROM doctor LEFT JOIN trust_relation_file ON doctor.id = trust_relation_file.busi_id AND trust_relation_file.busi_type = 'doctor' LEFT JOIN trust_file ON trust_relation_file.file_id = trust_file.file_id ) doctorUrl, ( SELECT group_concat( trust_file.file_id ORDER BY trust_file.file_id DESC SEPARATOR '|' ) AS fileId FROM doctor LEFT JOIN trust_relation_file ON doctor.id = trust_relation_file.busi_id AND trust_relation_file.busi_type = 'doctor' LEFT JOIN trust_file ON trust_relation_file.file_id = trust_file.file_id ) doctorFileId, ( SELECT group_concat( trust_file.file_url ORDER BY trust_file.file_name DESC SEPARATOR '|' ) AS url FROM tracking_personnel LEFT JOIN trust_relation_file ON tracking_personnel.id = trust_relation_file.busi_id AND trust_relation_file.busi_type = 'trackingPersonne' LEFT JOIN trust_file ON trust_relation_file.file_id = trust_file.file_id ) tarkUrl, ( SELECT group_concat( trust_file.file_id ORDER BY trust_file.file_id DESC SEPARATOR '|' ) AS fileId FROM tracking_personnel LEFT JOIN trust_relation_file ON doctor.id = trust_relation_file.busi_id AND trust_relation_file.busi_type = 'trackingPersonne' LEFT JOIN trust_file ON trust_relation_file.file_id = trust_file.file_id ) tarkFileId FROM wound_orders AS wo LEFT JOIN tracking_personnel AS tp ON wo.task_id = tp.id LEFT JOIN doctor ON doctor.id = wo.doctor_id LEFT JOIN trust_relation_file ON wo.id = trust_relation_file.busi_id AND trust_relation_file.busi_type = 'woundOrders' LEFT JOIN trust_file ON trust_relation_file.file_id = trust_file.file_id
wo.order_number like concat('%',#{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and wo.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY wo.order_number ORDER BY wo.create_time DESC LIMIT #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{end,jdbcType=INTEGER} )count

SELECT wo.id, wo.appointment_type, wo.association_id, wo.business, wo.create_time, wo.doctor_id, wo.is_confirm, wo.is_delete, wo.is_reservation, wo.medical_number, wo.ord_type, wo.order_number, wo.order_price, wo.order_type, wo.perioperative_surgery, wo.surgery_name, wo.surgery_time, wo.taking_lens, wo.task_id, wo.update_time, wo.wound_condition, wo.wound_photo_ids, wo.wound_photography_time, tp.`name`, tp.barcode_photo, tp.phone, doctor.doctor_name, doctor.doctor_introduce, doctor.doctor_photo, doctor.doctor_services, doctor.doctor_type, group_concat(trust_file.file_url ORDER BY trust_file.file_name DESC SEPARATOR '|') AS url, group_concat(trust_file.file_id ORDER BY trust_file.file_id DESC SEPARATOR '|') AS fileId, ( SELECT group_concat(trust_file.file_url ORDER BY trust_file.file_name DESC SEPARATOR '|') AS url FROM doctor LEFT JOIN trust_relation_file ON doctor.id = trust_relation_file.busi_id AND trust_relation_file.busi_type = 'doctor' LEFT JOIN trust_file ON trust_relation_file.file_id = trust_file.file_id ) doctorUrl, ( SELECT group_concat(trust_file.file_id ORDER BY trust_file.file_id DESC SEPARATOR '|') AS fileId FROM doctor LEFT JOIN trust_relation_file ON doctor.id = trust_relation_file.busi_id AND trust_relation_file.busi_type = 'doctor' LEFT JOIN trust_file ON trust_relation_file.file_id = trust_file.file_id ) doctorFileId, ( SELECT group_concat(trust_file.file_url ORDER BY trust_file.file_name DESC SEPARATOR '|') AS url FROM tracking_personnel LEFT JOIN trust_relation_file ON tracking_personnel.id = trust_relation_file.busi_id AND trust_relation_file.busi_type = 'trackingPersonne' LEFT JOIN trust_file ON trust_relation_file.file_id = trust_file.file_id ) tarkUrl, ( SELECT group_concat(trust_file.file_id ORDER BY trust_file.file_id DESC SEPARATOR '|') AS fileId FROM tracking_personnel LEFT JOIN trust_relation_file ON doctor.id = trust_relation_file.busi_id AND trust_relation_file.busi_type = 'trackingPersonne' LEFT JOIN trust_file ON trust_relation_file.file_id = trust_file.file_id ) tarkFileId FROM wound_orders AS wo LEFT JOIN tracking_personnel AS tp ON wo.task_id = tp.id LEFT JOIN doctor ON doctor.id = wo.doctor_id LEFT JOIN trust_relation_file ON wo.id = trust_relation_file.busi_id AND trust_relation_file.busi_type = 'woundOrders' LEFT JOIN trust_file ON trust_relation_file.file_id = trust_file.file_id where wo.is_delete = 0 and wo.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY wo.order_number
